pre_encounter.title: Approaching Danger
pre_encounter.text: The air grows thick with tension as your sensors detect movement ahead. Warning lights flicker on your HUD as unknown energy signatures register nearby. Your combat protocols begin to activate automatically.

pre_encounter.title: Territorial Intrusion
pre_encounter.text: You've wandered into someone else's territory. Scratch marks on nearby metal surfaces and the lingering scent of energon suggest this area is actively patrolled. The silence feels ominous.

pre_encounter.title: Distress Signal
pre_encounter.text: A weak distress signal crackles through your comm system. Following the transmission leads you deeper into dangerous territory, but you can't ignore a call for help. Your spark compels you forward.

pre_encounter.title: Ancient Guardian Stirs
pre_encounter.text: Your footsteps echo through the ancient corridors, disturbing dust that hasn't moved for millennia. Somewhere in the darkness, ancient systems begin to hum to life, awakened by your presence.

pre_encounter.title: The Hunt Begins
pre_encounter.text: You realize you're being stalked. The feeling of optics watching you from the shadows grows stronger with each step. Your pursuer is patient, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

pre_encounter.title: Energon Theft
pre_encounter.text: Your energon reserves are running dangerously low, and you've detected a rich vein nearby. Unfortunately, it's already being harvested by hostile forces who won't appreciate your intrusion.

pre_encounter.title: Walking Into an Ambush
pre_encounter.text: The path ahead seems too convenient, too clear. Your tactical subroutines scream warnings as you realize this is exactly where an enemy would want you to be. It's too late to turn back now.

pre_encounter.title: Rival Confrontation
pre_encounter.text: An old rival emerges from the shadows, their optics burning with unresolved hatred. Words have failed between you before, and it seems today will be no different. Combat is inevitable.

pre_encounter.title: Protecting the Innocent
pre_encounter.text: Civilian Cybertronians cower behind you as hostile forces advance. Their frightened optics look to you for protection. You cannot - will not - let them down.

pre_encounter.title: Relic Guardian
pre_encounter.text: The ancient relic you seek is protected by automated defenses that have waited eons for an intruder. As you approach, weapon systems that predate the Great War begin to target you.

pre_encounter.title: Faction Border Dispute
pre_encounter.text: You've crossed into disputed territory where faction loyalties run deep. Enemy patrols have spotted you, and diplomatic immunity means nothing in this war-torn region.

pre_encounter.title: Corrupted Ally
pre_encounter.text: A former ally approaches, but something is wrong. Their optics glow with an unnatural light, and their movements are jerky, controlled. Dark energon corruption has claimed another victim.

pre_encounter.title: Resource Competition
pre_encounter.text: The rare mineral deposit you've discovered is also being claimed by another group. Neither side is willing to share, and the tension in the air suggests negotiations are about to turn violent.

pre_encounter.title: Honor Duel
pre_encounter.text: Your honor has been challenged according to ancient Cybertronian law. The ritual combat circle has been drawn, and witnesses gather. There is no backing down from this sacred obligation.

pre_encounter.title: Virus Outbreak
pre_encounter.text: A computer virus has infected the local population, turning peaceful Cybertronians into aggressive attackers. You must defend yourself while seeking a cure for this digital plague.

pre_encounter.title: Testing Grounds
pre_encounter.text: You've stumbled into an active weapons testing facility. Automated systems mistake you for a test target, and deadly prototypes begin emerging from hidden compartments.

pre_encounter.title: Spark Extraction
pre_encounter.text: Shadowy figures surround you with spark-extraction equipment. These black market dealers in consciousness have marked you as their next victim. Your very essence is at stake.

pre_encounter.title: Gladiatorial Arena
pre_encounter.text: The crowd roars as you're pushed into the arena. Whether you came here willingly or were captured, the only way out is through combat. Your opponent enters from the opposite gate.

pre_encounter.title: Revenge Seeker
pre_encounter.text: Someone from your past has finally tracked you down. Their thirst for vengeance has consumed them, and they've spent years preparing for this moment. Old wounds are about to be reopened.

pre_encounter.title: Matrix Bearer Challenge
pre_encounter.text: Another claims to be worthy of bearing the Matrix of Leadership. They challenge your right to carry Primus's wisdom, and only combat can determine who is truly chosen.

pre_encounter.title: Time Loop Combat
pre_encounter.text: You've fought this battle before - many times. Trapped in a temporal loop, you must find a way to break the cycle while engaging the same enemy over and over again.

pre_encounter.title: Dimensional Invader
pre_encounter.text: A being from another dimension has crossed into your reality, bringing alien combat techniques and impossible weapons. This fight will test everything you know about warfare.

pre_encounter.title: Spark Bond Severed
pre_encounter.text: Your spark-bonded partner has been turned against you by enemy manipulation. Fighting someone you love is the cruelest form of combat, but their life depends on your victory.

pre_encounter.title: Final Stand
pre_encounter.text: This is it - your last chance to make a difference. Enemy forces have you surrounded, your allies are gone, but you still have fight left in you. History will remember this moment.

pre_encounter.title: Training Malfunction
pre_encounter.text: The training simulation has malfunctioned, and the safety protocols are offline. What was meant to be practice has become a fight for survival against increasingly deadly scenarios.

post_encounter.title: Victory's Weight
post_encounter.text: As the dust settles from battle, you stand among the debris of conflict. Victory tastes of energon and metal, but you wonder if there could have been another way. Your spark dims slightly with the weight of necessary violence.

post_encounter.title: Battle Scars
post_encounter.text: Your armor bears new scratches and dents from the encounter. Each mark tells a story of survival, adding to the chronicle written across your frame. You run diagnostics and continue forward.

post_encounter.title: Lessons Learned
post_encounter.text: The battle taught you something new about combat, about yourself, or about your enemies. You file away these insights for future encounters, knowing that adaptation is the key to survival.

post_encounter.title: Energon Recovery
post_encounter.text: You pause to recover from the intense energy expenditure of battle. Your systems slowly recharge as you process what just occurred. The taste of victory energizes your spark.

post_encounter.title: Honor the Fallen
post_encounter.text: You take a moment to honor your defeated opponent. Even in conflict, there was courage in their stand. You offer a brief prayer to Primus for their spark's journey to the Well of All Sparks.

post_encounter.title: Pyrrhic Victory
post_encounter.text: You won, but at what cost? The damage to yourself and your surroundings makes this victory feel hollow. Sometimes winning means everyone loses something important.

post_encounter.title: Unexpected Alliance
post_encounter.text: Your defeated opponent extends a hand in friendship, recognizing your skill and honor in combat. What began as conflict has forged a new alliance that may prove valuable.

post_encounter.title: Tactical Evolution
post_encounter.text: The fight forced you to develop new combat techniques on the fly. Your tactical subroutines have evolved, incorporating these innovations into your permanent combat protocols.

post_encounter.title: Spark Strengthened
post_encounter.text: The intensity of combat has somehow strengthened your spark. You feel more alive, more connected to the essence of what makes you Cybertronian. Power flows through your circuits.

post_encounter.title: Collateral Damage
post_encounter.text: The battle has left the surrounding area scarred and damaged. You survey the destruction with regret, knowing that sometimes the cost of victory extends beyond the combatants.

post_encounter.title: Enemy Intelligence
post_encounter.text: Your opponent's databanks contained valuable intelligence about enemy movements and plans. This information could prove crucial in future conflicts, making the battle worthwhile.

post_encounter.title: Reputation Earned
post_encounter.text: Word of your victory will spread quickly through the networks. Your reputation as a formidable warrior grows, which may open new opportunities or attract new challenges.

post_encounter.title: Mercy Shown
post_encounter.text: You chose to spare your defeated opponent when you could have finished them. This act of mercy reflects the nobility of your spark and may have consequences you cannot yet foresee.

post_encounter.title: Technology Salvaged
post_encounter.text: Among the wreckage, you discover advanced technology that could be useful. Salvaging these components feels practical, though you're careful to treat the remains with respect.

post_encounter.title: Processing Trauma
post_encounter.text: The violence of combat has left psychological scars alongside the physical ones. You take time to process the trauma, knowing that mental health is as important as physical repair.

post_encounter.title: Matrix Guidance
post_encounter.text: The Matrix of Leadership (or its distant influence) provides comfort and guidance after the battle. You feel connected to the wisdom of past Primes who faced similar trials.

post_encounter.title: Civilian Gratitude
post_encounter.text: Grateful civilians emerge from hiding to thank you for protecting them. Their appreciation reminds you why you fight and gives meaning to the violence you've endured.

post_encounter.title: Enemy Respect
post_encounter.text: Even your enemies acknowledge your skill and honor in combat. This grudging respect may serve you well in future encounters, as word spreads of your prowess.

post_encounter.title: System Upgrades
post_encounter.text: The stress of combat has triggered automatic system upgrades in your frame. Your body has adapted to become more efficient, stronger, and better prepared for future conflicts.

post_encounter.title: Spark Bond Forged
post_encounter.text: The intensity of shared combat has created an unexpected spark bond with a fellow warrior. This deep connection will influence both your futures in ways yet unknown.

post_encounter.title: Ancient Awakening
post_encounter.text: The battle has awakened something ancient in the area - old defenses, sleeping guardians, or forgotten technology. Your conflict has set larger events in motion.

post_encounter.title: Energon Corruption
post_encounter.text: Exposure to corrupted energon during the fight has left you feeling different. The dark energy whispers promises of power while threatening to change who you are.

post_encounter.title: Temporal Echo
post_encounter.text: The battle has created ripples in time itself. You sense that this conflict will echo through multiple timelines, affecting past and future versions of yourself.

post_encounter.title: Primus's Blessing
post_encounter.text: You feel the direct blessing of Primus upon you after the righteous battle. Divine energy flows through your circuits, marking you as an instrument of cosmic justice.

post_encounter.title: War Weariness
post_encounter.text: Another battle, another victory, but the endless cycle of violence weighs heavily on your spark. You wonder when - if ever - the fighting will end and peace will return.

pre_event.title: Curious Discovery
pre_event.text: Something unusual catches your optic sensors. The object seems out of place in this environment, as if left here deliberately. Your curiosity protocols activate as you approach for a closer examination.

pre_event.title: Environmental Anomaly
pre_event.text: The area around you begins to change in unexpected ways. Energy readings fluctuate wildly, and your sensors struggle to make sense of the phenomenon. Something significant is about to happen.

pre_event.title: Crossroads Moment
pre_event.text: You find yourself at a literal and metaphorical crossroads. Multiple paths stretch before you, each leading to unknown possibilities. The choice you make here could change everything.

pre_event.title: Ancient Activation
pre_event.text: Ancient Cybertronian technology responds to your presence, systems that have lain dormant for eons suddenly springing to life. Glyphs begin to glow, and you sense you're about to witness something extraordinary.

pre_event.title: Fateful Encounter
pre_event.text: The Matrix of Leadership pulses within your chest (or you sense its distant call). This moment feels significant, as if the very fabric of destiny is shifting around you. Primus himself seems to be watching.

pre_event.title: Ominous Silence
pre_event.text: The usual sounds of Cybertron fade to an unnatural silence. Even the ambient hum of distant machinery has ceased. Your audio receptors strain to detect any sound, but the quiet feels pregnant with possibility.

pre_event.title: Spark Resonance
pre_event.text: Your spark begins to resonate with an unknown frequency. The sensation is both familiar and alien, as if something is calling to the very essence of your being from across time and space.

pre_event.title: Temporal Disturbance
pre_event.text: Time seems to slow around you, each nanosecond stretching into eternity. Your chronometer struggles to maintain accuracy as reality itself appears to be preparing for something momentous.

pre_event.title: Energy Convergence
pre_event.text: Multiple energy signatures converge on your location from different directions. The readings are unlike anything in your databases, suggesting forces beyond current scientific understanding are at work.

pre_event.title: Primal Awakening
pre_event.text: Something ancient stirs in the depths of Cybertron. You feel it through the planet's core - a consciousness older than recorded history beginning to take notice of current events.

pre_event.title: Dimensional Shift
pre_event.text: The fabric of reality ripples around you like water disturbed by a stone. Colors seem more vivid, sounds carry impossible harmonics, and you sense other dimensions pressing close to your own.

pre_event.title: Prophetic Vision
pre_event.text: Fragments of possible futures flash through your consciousness. The visions are unclear but urgent, suggesting that what happens next will have far-reaching consequences for all Cybertronians.

pre_event.title: Magnetic Anomaly
pre_event.text: Your internal compass spins wildly as magnetic fields fluctuate in impossible patterns. The very laws of physics seem to be bending in preparation for something unprecedented.

pre_event.title: Ancestral Whispers
pre_event.text: Faint voices from the past echo in your audio receptors - the wisdom of ancient Cybertronians carried on quantum frequencies. They seem to be trying to warn you about what's coming.

pre_event.title: Stellar Alignment
pre_event.text: The stars above align in a configuration that occurs once every million years. Ancient texts spoke of such moments as times when the impossible becomes possible.

pre_event.title: Quantum Fluctuation
pre_event.text: Reality flickers at the quantum level, probability waves collapsing and reforming in patterns that suggest multiple timelines converging on this single moment.

pre_event.title: Matrix Echo
pre_event.text: An echo of the Matrix of Leadership reverberates through the local space-time continuum. Even if you don't bear the Matrix, you feel its influence preparing the universe for change.

pre_event.title: Shadow of Unicron
pre_event.text: A chill runs through your circuits as you sense the distant influence of Unicron. The Chaos Bringer's presence, though far away, seems to be stirring in response to current events.

pre_event.title: AllSpark Pulse
pre_event.text: The AllSpark sends out a pulse of pure creation energy that resonates through every spark on Cybertron. This is more than communication - it's a call to action.

pre_event.title: Probability Storm
pre_event.text: Chance itself seems to be gathering like a storm. Random events cluster around this moment, as if fate is concentrating all its attention on what's about to unfold.

post_event.title: Consequences Unfold
post_event.text: The ripple effects of your actions begin to manifest. You can sense that your choices have set events in motion that will echo through time. The weight of responsibility settles on your shoulders.

post_event.title: Wisdom Gained
post_event.text: The experience has taught you something valuable about yourself, about others, or about the nature of existence. This knowledge becomes part of who you are, shaping your future decisions.

post_event.title: New Purpose
post_event.text: What just occurred has given you a new sense of direction. Your mission parameters have evolved, and you feel a renewed sense of purpose driving you forward into the unknown.

post_event.title: Mysterious Aftermath
post_event.text: The event's conclusion leaves more questions than answers. Strange energies linger in the air, and you can't shake the feeling that this was only the beginning of something much larger.

post_event.title: Spark Resonance
post_event.text: Your spark resonates with the energies released by the event. You feel more connected to the greater tapestry of Cybertronian existence, as if you've touched something fundamental about your nature.

post_event.title: Reality Stabilizes
post_event.text: The strange phenomena that preceded the event begin to fade, and reality settles back into familiar patterns. Yet you know that something fundamental has changed, even if it's not immediately visible.

post_event.title: Temporal Echo
post_event.text: You sense that this event has created echoes across time itself. Past and future seem to acknowledge what just occurred, as if this moment was always meant to happen.

post_event.title: Burden Accepted
post_event.text: A new weight settles upon your consciousness - not just responsibility, but a burden that comes with greater understanding. You accept it willingly, knowing it's part of your growth.

post_event.title: Power Awakened
post_event.text: Something within you has awakened - a power, ability, or understanding that was dormant before. You feel changed at a fundamental level, evolved by the experience.

post_event.title: Connection Forged
post_event.text: The event has created new connections - to other beings, to cosmic forces, or to aspects of yourself you didn't know existed. These bonds will influence your future path.

post_event.title: Memory Crystallized
post_event.text: This moment crystallizes in your memory banks with perfect clarity. You know you'll remember every detail forever, and that this experience will serve as a reference point for future decisions.

post_event.title: Paradigm Shift
post_event.text: Your entire worldview has shifted. Concepts you once held as absolute truth now seem limited, and new possibilities stretch before you like an infinite horizon.

post_event.title: Cosmic Acknowledgment
post_event.text: You sense that the universe itself has taken notice of what just transpired. Cosmic forces that normally ignore individual actions seem to be watching you with new interest.

post_event.title: Price Paid
post_event.text: Every significant event demands a price, and you feel the cost of what just occurred. Whether it's energy, innocence, or something more abstract, you've paid for this experience.

post_event.title: Harmony Restored
post_event.text: The chaos and uncertainty that preceded the event gives way to a sense of harmony and balance. You feel more aligned with your true purpose and the natural order of things.

post_event.title: Legacy Begun
post_event.text: You realize that what just happened will be remembered long after you're gone. This event marks the beginning of a legacy that will influence future generations of Cybertronians.

post_event.title: Quantum Entanglement
post_event.text: The event has created quantum entanglements between you and other elements of the universe. You're now connected to distant places and beings in ways that transcend normal physics.

post_event.title: Prophecy Fulfilled
post_event.text: Ancient prophecies spoke of this moment, and you realize you've just played a part in fulfilling cosmic destiny. The weight of predestination mingles with the satisfaction of purpose.

post_event.title: Dimensional Awareness
post_event.text: Your consciousness has expanded to perceive other dimensions and realities. The multiverse reveals itself as a vast tapestry of possibilities, and you understand your place within it.

post_event.title: Eternal Moment
post_event.text: This experience transcends normal time, becoming an eternal moment that exists outside the flow of history. Part of you will always remain in this instant, forever changed by what occurred.

travel_narrative.title: Journey Across Cybertron
travel_narrative.text: You traverse the varied landscapes of Cybertron, from gleaming crystal cities to rust-covered wastelands. Each step takes you further from familiar territory and deeper into the unknown.

travel_narrative.title: Among the Stars
travel_narrative.text: Space stretches endlessly around you as you travel between worlds. The silence is profound, broken only by the hum of your systems and the distant song of cosmic radiation.

travel_narrative.title: Underground Passage
travel_narrative.text: The tunnels beneath Cybertron wind through ancient geology and forgotten history. Your footsteps echo in chambers that haven't seen visitors for millions of years.

travel_narrative.title: War-Torn Landscape
travel_narrative.text: The scars of endless conflict mark every surface around you. Blast craters and twisted metal serve as monuments to the price of war, reminding you why peace is worth fighting for.

travel_narrative.title: Pristine Wilderness
travel_narrative.text: You discover an area untouched by war, where Cybertron's natural beauty still shines. Crystal formations catch and refract light in spectacular displays, reminding you of what you're fighting to preserve.

travel_narrative.title: Through Acid Rain
travel_narrative.text: Corrosive precipitation falls from the polluted sky as you push forward. Your armor hisses and steams, but your determination remains unshaken. This toxic environment is a testament to war's environmental cost.

travel_narrative.title: Crystal Forest Passage
travel_narrative.text: You navigate through a forest of towering energon crystals, their natural formations creating a maze of light and shadow. The ambient energy makes your spark sing with resonance.

travel_narrative.title: Magnetic Storm Crossing
travel_narrative.text: Electromagnetic interference wreaks havoc on your navigation systems as you cross a region plagued by magnetic storms. You must rely on instinct and basic sensors to find your way.

travel_narrative.title: Through Abandoned Cities
travel_narrative.text: Empty streets and silent towers stretch before you. This once-thriving metropolis now stands as a ghost town, its inhabitants long since fled or fallen. Your footsteps echo with loneliness.

travel_narrative.title: Energon Rapids
travel_narrative.text: Liquid energon flows like a river through this canyon, its current swift and dangerous. You must carefully navigate the banks, knowing that one misstep could mean energon poisoning.

travel_narrative.title: Zero Gravity Zone
travel_narrative.text: Gravitational anomalies cause you to float and drift as you traverse this strange region. Moving requires careful calculation and precise thruster control to avoid floating into hazards.

travel_narrative.title: Temporal Distortion Field
travel_narrative.text: Time moves strangely here - sometimes fast, sometimes slow, sometimes seeming to loop back on itself. You push through the chronological chaos, trusting your internal chronometer.

travel_narrative.title: Scrapyard Maze
travel_narrative.text: Mountains of discarded metal and broken machinery create a labyrinthine path. Each piece of scrap tells a story of loss, but also of the potential for rebirth and recycling.

travel_narrative.title: Aurora Fields
travel_narrative.text: Electromagnetic auroras dance across the sky in brilliant displays of color. The beauty is breathtaking, but the radiation requires you to shield your more sensitive systems.

travel_narrative.title: Volcanic Region
travel_narrative.text: Molten metal flows like lava from active volcanic vents. The heat is intense, pushing your cooling systems to their limits as you navigate between flows of liquid steel and copper.

travel_narrative.title: Ice Caverns
travel_narrative.text: Frozen methane and crystallized gases form an icy wonderland beneath Cybertron's surface. Your breath creates vapor clouds as you carefully traverse the slippery passages.

travel_narrative.title: Data Stream Highway
travel_narrative.text: You travel along ancient information conduits, watching streams of data flow past like digital rivers. The constant flow of information creates a hypnotic, almost meditative journey.

travel_narrative.title: Mirror Maze
travel_narrative.text: Reflective surfaces create an endless maze of your own image. Each reflection seems to show a different version of yourself - past, present, or potential future.

travel_narrative.title: Sound Barrier Crossing
travel_narrative.text: You break through multiple sound barriers as you travel at high speed. The sonic booms echo across the landscape, announcing your passage to anyone within audio range.

travel_narrative.title: Stealth Infiltration
travel_narrative.text: Moving silently through enemy territory, every step calculated to avoid detection. Your cloaking systems work overtime as you slip past patrols and surveillance networks.

discovery_narrative.title: Ancient Ruins
discovery_narrative.text: You stumble upon ruins from Cybertron's golden age. The architecture speaks of a time when your people reached for the stars with hope rather than weapons. What secrets might these stones hold?

discovery_narrative.title: Hidden Cache
discovery_narrative.text: A concealed compartment reveals itself to your sensors. Someone went to great lengths to hide whatever lies within. The question is: were they hiding it from enemies, or from friends?

discovery_narrative.title: Energon Vein
discovery_narrative.text: Pure energon crystals jut from the rock face, their soft glow providing both light and life. This natural formation could power a city, but extracting it safely will require careful consideration.

discovery_narrative.title: Memorial Site
discovery_narrative.text: You discover a memorial to fallen Transformers, their names etched in eternal metal. The site radiates a sense of peace and remembrance, a place where sparks are honored regardless of faction.

discovery_narrative.title: Technological Marvel
discovery_narrative.text: An incredible piece of technology lies before you, its purpose unclear but its sophistication undeniable. This could be a weapon, a tool, or something beyond current understanding.

discovery_narrative.title: Primal Artifact
discovery_narrative.text: An artifact from the time of Primus himself lies before you, radiating ancient power. Its very presence makes your spark resonate with frequencies older than recorded history.

discovery_narrative.title: Abandoned Laboratory
discovery_narrative.text: You discover a secret laboratory filled with experimental equipment and half-finished projects. The research notes suggest experiments that pushed the boundaries of ethical science.

discovery_narrative.title: Hidden Safehouse
discovery_narrative.text: A concealed Autobot safehouse reveals itself, complete with supplies, weapons, and communication equipment. Someone prepared this refuge for desperate times.

discovery_narrative.title: Spark Chamber
discovery_narrative.text: You find an ancient chamber designed for spark ceremonies. The walls are inscribed with prayers and blessings in the oldest Cybertronian dialects, creating a sacred atmosphere.

discovery_narrative.title: Data Vault
discovery_narrative.text: A massive data storage facility contains petabytes of information from across Cybertron's history. The knowledge here could reshape understanding of your people's past.

discovery_narrative.title: Weapon Cache
discovery_narrative.text: Hidden weapons of incredible power await discovery. These armaments could turn the tide of battle, but their destructive potential raises questions about their proper use.

discovery_narrative.title: Medical Facility
discovery_narrative.text: An advanced medical facility contains equipment for spark surgery and frame reconstruction. The technology here could save lives, but requires skilled operators to use safely.

discovery_narrative.title: Communication Array
discovery_narrative.text: A powerful communication array capable of reaching across star systems lies dormant. Reactivating it could reestablish contact with distant allies or reveal enemy positions.

discovery_narrative.title: Transformation Chamber
discovery_narrative.text: You discover a chamber designed to enhance or modify transformation abilities. The technology is advanced but dangerous - one mistake could permanently alter your alt-mode.

discovery_narrative.title: Matrix Fragment
discovery_narrative.text: A fragment of the Matrix of Leadership pulses with residual power. Though incomplete, it still carries echoes of the wisdom and authority of past Primes.

discovery_narrative.title: Temporal Device
discovery_narrative.text: An experimental time manipulation device sits inactive but intact. The implications of its existence are staggering - someone was attempting to alter the flow of time itself.

discovery_narrative.title: Dark Relic
discovery_narrative.text: You discover an artifact that radiates dark energy, possibly connected to Unicron. Its presence fills you with unease, yet you sense it may be important to understanding ancient threats.

discovery_narrative.title: Peace Treaty
discovery_narrative.text: Hidden documents reveal attempts at peace negotiations between factions. The treaty was never signed, but its terms suggest there were those on both sides who sought an end to conflict.

discovery_narrative.title: Star Map
discovery_narrative.text: An ancient star map shows the locations of lost Cybertronian colonies and outposts. Some of these worlds may still harbor survivors or valuable resources.

discovery_narrative.title: Energon Forge
discovery_narrative.text: You find a forge capable of refining raw energon into pure, concentrated forms. The technology could revolutionize energy distribution, but requires rare materials to operate.

discovery_narrative.title: Personality Core
discovery_narrative.text: An intact personality core from a fallen Transformer contains their memories and experiences. Activating it could provide valuable intelligence, but raises ethical questions about digital resurrection.

discovery_narrative.title: Dimensional Gateway
discovery_narrative.text: A dormant gateway to other dimensions awaits activation. The technology is beyond current understanding, and opening it could lead to salvation or catastrophe.

discovery_narrative.title: Creation Matrix
discovery_narrative.text: You discover a device capable of creating new sparks - the power to give life itself. This technology represents the ultimate expression of Primus's creative force.

discovery_narrative.title: Quantum Computer
discovery_narrative.text: An advanced quantum computing system contains simulations of possible futures. The calculations are so complex they seem to predict probability itself.

discovery_narrative.title: Harmony Crystal
discovery_narrative.text: A crystal that resonates with peaceful emotions lies hidden in a place of natural beauty. Its presence seems to calm aggressive impulses and promote understanding.

character_reflection.title: Questioning Purpose
character_reflection.text: In the quiet moments between action, you find yourself questioning your purpose. What drives you forward? Is it duty, hope, revenge, or something deeper? Your spark pulses with uncertainty.

character_reflection.title: Memory Fragment
character_reflection.text: A fragment of memory surfaces unbidden - a moment from your past that shaped who you are today. The recollection brings both pain and clarity, reminding you of how far you've come.

character_reflection.title: Spark Connection
character_reflection.text: You feel a deep connection to the All Spark, to Primus, to the very essence of what it means to be Cybertronian. This moment of spiritual clarity strengthens your resolve for the challenges ahead.

character_reflection.title: Growth Realization
character_reflection.text: You realize how much you've changed since your journey began. The experiences have forged you into something new, something stronger. You're no longer the same Transformer who started this path.

character_reflection.title: Burden of Choice
character_reflection.text: The weight of the choices you've made settles heavily on your consciousness. Each decision has led to consequences, some intended, others not. You carry the responsibility for all of them.

character_reflection.title: Remembering the Fallen
character_reflection.text: The faces of those who didn't make it this far flash through your memory banks. Their sacrifices weren't in vain - you carry their hopes forward with every step you take.

character_reflection.title: Longing for Cybertron
character_reflection.text: A deep ache resonates through your spark as you remember Cybertron before the war. The golden age seems like a distant dream now, but perhaps it can be rebuilt.

character_reflection.title: Understanding the Enemy
character_reflection.text: For a moment, you try to understand your enemies' perspective. What drives them? Are they truly evil, or simply misguided? The complexity of war weighs on your processor.

character_reflection.title: Acknowledging Fear
character_reflection.text: You admit to yourself what you rarely voice aloud - you are afraid. Fear of failure, of loss, of becoming something you despise. But courage isn't the absence of fear; it's acting despite it.

character_reflection.title: Hope Rekindled
character_reflection.text: Despite everything you've witnessed, hope flickers within your spark like an eternal flame. Perhaps there is still a chance for peace, for redemption, for a better tomorrow.

character_reflection.title: Mentor's Wisdom
character_reflection.text: Words from a mentor echo in your audio receptors - advice given long ago that suddenly makes perfect sense in this moment. Their guidance continues to shape your path.

character_reflection.title: Identity Crisis
character_reflection.text: Who are you really? Beneath the armor, beyond the faction symbols, stripped of rank and title - what remains? The question haunts you more than any enemy ever could.

character_reflection.title: Hidden Strength
character_reflection.text: You discover reserves of strength you didn't know you possessed. Not just physical power, but emotional resilience, mental fortitude, and spiritual endurance that surprise even you.

character_reflection.title: Processing Regret
character_reflection.text: Regret cycles through your consciousness like a virus. If only you had acted differently, spoken up sooner, been stronger when it mattered. But dwelling on the past serves no one.

character_reflection.title: Value of Friendship
character_reflection.text: The bonds you've forged with your allies mean more than any treasure or victory. In a universe of conflict, these connections remind you what you're truly fighting to protect.

character_reflection.title: Transformation Metaphor
character_reflection.text: Your ability to transform isn't just physical - it's a reminder that change is possible, that you can become something new while retaining your core essence. Growth and adaptation are survival.

character_reflection.title: Contemplating Legacy
character_reflection.text: What legacy will you leave behind? Will future generations remember you as a hero, a villain, or simply another casualty of war? The weight of history presses upon your shoulders.

character_reflection.title: Innocence Lost
character_reflection.text: You mourn the innocence you've lost along this journey. The naive optimism of your younger cycles seems like a luxury you can no longer afford, yet you miss its simplicity.

character_reflection.title: Duty vs Desire
character_reflection.text: The eternal conflict between what you must do and what you want to do tears at your spark. Duty demands sacrifice, but desire whispers of a different path entirely.

character_reflection.title: Seeking Primus' Guidance
character_reflection.text: In your darkest moment, you reach out to Primus for guidance. Whether the response comes as divine intervention or inner wisdom, you feel a presence guiding your steps.

character_reflection.title: War Weariness
character_reflection.text: The endless cycle of conflict has worn you down to your very core. You dream of a time when weapons can be set aside, when peace isn't just a distant memory but a living reality.

character_reflection.title: Unexpected Joy
character_reflection.text: A moment of pure, unexpected joy breaks through the darkness like sunlight through storm clouds. You realize that even in the worst times, beauty and happiness can still be found.

character_reflection.title: Wisdom Gained
character_reflection.text: Experience has taught you lessons that no datapad or mentor could impart. Hard-won wisdom flows through your circuits, making you wiser but also more aware of how much you still don't know.

character_reflection.title: Meaning of Sacrifice
character_reflection.text: You contemplate the true meaning of sacrifice. It's not just about giving up something valuable - it's about choosing what matters most when you can't have everything.

character_reflection.title: Spark Evolution
character_reflection.text: Your spark feels different than it did at the beginning of this journey. Not just older, but evolved - refined by experience, tempered by hardship, and brightened by hope.

character_reflection.title: Former Enemies
character_reflection.text: You think about those who were once enemies but have become allies. If such transformation is possible, perhaps there's hope for ending this war through understanding rather than destruction.

character_reflection.title: Matrix Connection
character_reflection.text: You feel a connection to the Matrix of Leadership, even if you don't bear it. The wisdom of past Primes flows through the collective consciousness of all Cybertronians.

character_reflection.title: Defining Home
character_reflection.text: What is home? Is it a place, a people, or a feeling? As you journey far from familiar territories, you realize home might be something you carry within yourself.

character_reflection.title: Source of Courage
character_reflection.text: You examine the source of your courage. Is it born from desperation, duty, love, or something else entirely? Understanding your motivation helps you tap into reserves you didn't know existed.

character_reflection.title: Vision of the Future
character_reflection.text: For a moment, you allow yourself to envision a future beyond war. What would you do in peacetime? Who would you become when survival is no longer your primary concern?
